summary: An engineer is hired to plan and oversee the construction of a undersea tunnel between Europe and the US. However, certain interests don't want to see the tunnel built and use every means ... See full summary »
cast: Paul Hartmann|Attila Hörbiger|Olly von Flint|Otto Wernicke|Gustaf Gründgens|Max Weydner|Elga Brink|Richard Ryen|Georg Henrich|Max Schreck|Magda Lena|Will Dohm|Ferdinand Marian|Josef Eichheim|Günther Vogdt|Erna Fentsch|Beppo Brem|Otto Brüggemann|Friedrich Ulmer
title: Der Tunnel
